annotations.description: The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. An impressive display from the visitors, they had the better of it. The home side was creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side was slow build up play.

The game produced by the players until now hasn't been particularly attractive, but there is still 45 minutes left so let's hope they will come out with renewed vigour and provide better entertainment this half. During the first 45 minutes, we have witnessed the ascendency of the visiting team who have been precise and effective. The home players attempt to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter attacks. The away team tries to prevail using combination football.

The performance from both sides could be described as average. There were only a few stirring moments and the fans probably expected more from this game. An impressive display from the visitors, they had the better of it. The home side was creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side was slow build up play.
